title: Whats Your Champion Pool?

replies.body: Yeah I noticed that after I put them all down and thought "Wow, and my favourite colour was Crimson (cough and cyan cough) the entire time..."

I'll play Skarner occasionally, but he's really not a part of my pool.
Overall I'll play all champs in the game, even Teemo and the really odd occasion Vayne or Yorick.

Really the thing that draws me to play Skarner is his Shurima skin :P
Gotta say that shurima skin is damn awesome!

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Ylg74EBZ,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-10-12T03:27:28.139+0000)
>
> I'll play Skarner occasionally, but he's really not a part of my pool.
> Overall I'll play all champs in the game, even Teemo and the really odd occasion Vayne or Yorick.
> 
> Really the thing that draws me to play Skarner is his Shurima skin :P

Fair enough.
Just that you said it's a really unhealthy Champion pool.
